main module¶

main.avg_interval()¶

Returns average heart rate based on user specified interval Interval goes from specified time point to the latest time point

Returns:out – Contains calculated average heart rate. May instead contain error message if user input is invalid.
Return type:json obj
main.get_avg_hr(patient_id)¶

Return average heart rate based on all stored heart rate of the specified patient

Parameters:patient_id (str or int) – user input indicating the patient to be inspected
Returns:out – Contains calculated average heart rate. May instead contain error message if user input is invalid.
Return type:json obj
main.get_hr(patient_id)¶

Return all stored heart rate of specified patient

Parameters:patient_id (str or int) – user input indicating the patient to be inspected
Returns:out – Contains list of stored heart rate of patient in integer. May instead contain error message if user input is invalid.
Return type:json obj
main.get_stat(patient_id)¶

Return whether patient’s heart rate shows tachycardia

Parameters:patient_id (str or int) – user input indicating the patient to be inspected
Returns:out – Contains status of patient. May instead contain error message if user input is invalid.
Return type:json obj
main.new_hr()¶

Stores a new heart rate into specified patient, a related time stamp will be added to patient profile as well.

Returns:out – Indicate the completion or errors of the action.
Return type:str
main.new_patient()¶

Stores a new patient into the system based on user input

Returns:out – Indicate the completion or errors of the action.
Return type:str

heart_rate_sentinel server
